EmailTemplate.name: Reminder 4 Days Later - Non Pinnacle
EmailTemplate.subject: Time to Launch The Property Website!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well. As a reminder, the preview website is ready to review, next step is to
Review the website ➡️ View Here Approve/submit edits ➡️ Click Here
Let us know if you have any questions.
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
